WorldPositionOriginType: Defines the reference space for the Position input.
Scale: can also be done with a multiply on the Position
Quality: Lower numbers are faster and lower quality, higher numbers are slower and higher quality
NoiseFunction: Noise function, affects performance and look
Levels: 1 = fast but little detail, .. larger numbers cost more performance
LevelScale: usually 2 but higher values allow efficient use of few levels
RepeatSize: How many units in each tile (if Tiling is on)
bTurbulence: How multiple frequencies are getting combined
bTiling: Whether to use tiling noise pattern, useful for baking to seam-free repeating textures
